Rulings.Edison: ●This effect activates even if “Reptilianne Naga” is destroyed during the Damage Step. If “Reptilianne Naga” is in Attack Position, the effect to change it to Attack Position does not activate. The effect to change a monster’s ATK to 0 applies as long as that monster is face-up on the field.
Rulings.Tengu: ●This effect activates even if “Reptilianne Naga” is destroyed during the Damage Step. If “Reptilianne Naga” is in face-up Attack Position, the effect to change it to Attack Position does not activate. The effect to change a monster’s ATK to 0 applies as long as that monster is face-up on the field.

Rulings.Base:
1. This effect activates even if "Reptilianne Naga" is destroyed during the Damage Step.

(For ruling #1, Naga’s effect to change a monster’s ATK to 0 activates in the End Step, so it must be face-up at that time. Source: j-wiki.)
2. If "Reptilianne Naga" is in face-up Attack Position, the effect to change it to Attack Position does not activate.
3. The effect to change a monster's ATK to 0 applies as long as that monster is face-up on the field.

PSCT.Base: This card cannot be destroyed by battle. The ATK of any monster that battles this card becomes 0 at the end of that Battle Phase. During your End Phase, change this face-up Defense Position card on the field to face-up Attack Position.
